categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Waterboy" was the callsign of a young, petite, female ensign in the Praesitlyn Defense Force. She was a friend of T-19 starfighter pilots Lieutenant Erk H'Arman and Ensign Pleth Strom. The control ship she was aboard was shot down by Confederate forces, and she was assumed not to have survived.
